text: This is hands down the best cup of coffee. It helps me not drink a whole pot of coffee, because 1) It is too expensive to drink more than one via a morning. Even though I often cheat and have two. 2) It is so satisfying, i don't need to sit and drink 4 cups of okay coffee to get a good coffee fix. Great product. And AWESOME to travel with. So you can go anywhere and have a great cup of coffee.
